skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you have any problem when you use this skill,you can contact us with email: sales@china-siter.com
Amazon Alexa and Familywell smart home products work together to help you control your home appliance nice and easy.
You can tell Alexa you want and do not need use you phone or do by yourself.
Connecting Alexa with Familywell smart home in a few simple steps:
1) Download the "Alexa" app in the Android or IOS APP market.
2) Use the Echo account to log in.
3) Click the skills and enter the " ST-Home " in search bar.
4) Enter the " ST-Home " page and click the "ENABLE".
5) Enter your Familywell account to connect Familywell system with Alexa.
6) You can control your Familywell devices throuth Alexa now.

For example:
1)"Alexa,i am at home"
The Familywell system will switch to home modes automatically.

2)"Alexa,turn on the bedroom light"
The Familywell system will turn on the bedroom light automatically.(The system control the plug actually)
